title: One Medical CEO departs one year after Amazon acquisition
description: A little over a year after Amazon bought concierge primary health care start-up One Medical for $3.9 billion, CEO Amir Dan Rubin is leaving the company.

title: LinkedIn posts have gotten personal and deep
description: Why some LinkedIn users have become more comfortable detailing their relationship challenges, health issues and parenting milestones.

title: How to talk to an AI chatbot
description: The Washington Post’s guide to getting the most out of AI chatbots — from OpenAI’s ChatGPT to Google’s Bard and Microsoft’s Bing— and avoiding common pitfalls.
